title: 破禁与卷轴 · 玉矶阁

scenes.description: 片头卷轴翻开，字幕“上一回 · 太妙玄禁”，背景为蓝翠晶壁大厅。

visual.composition: Golden scroll unfurling above glowing crystal hall
visual.environment: Blue-green jade-like walls with ambient light

scenes.prompt: xianxia title card, golden scroll over glowing crystal hall, cinematic lighting
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，第175集《破禁与卷轴》敬请诸位观赏。

scenes.description: 韩立站在晶墙前，瞳孔深处蓝芒闪动，用明清灵目仔细观察晶墙深处。

visual.composition: Han Li's eyes with blue glow reflected in crystal surface

scenes.prompt: close-up of cultivator's eyes with blue glow examining crystal wall, focused expression
scenes.narration: 韩立站在晶墙前，瞳孔深处蓝芒闪动，用明清灵目探查禁制结构。

scenes.description: 韩立观察半刻钟后，目中蓝光消失，从储物袋中取出十几杆颜色各异的阵旗。

visual.composition: Han Li holding array of colorful flags floating before him

scenes.prompt: cultivator holding colorful array flags floating in air, preparing to set up formation
scenes.narration: 观察半刻钟后，韩立目中蓝光消失，从储物袋中取出十几杆阵旗。

scenes.description: 白衫老者惊讶询问韩立是否精通阵法，韩立淡然回应只是略懂一二。

visual.composition: Elder asking Han Li with flags in background

scenes.prompt: two cultivators conversing in crystal hall, one surprised, one calm
scenes.narration: 白衫老者惊讶询问韩立是否精通阵法，韩立淡然回应只是略懂一二。

scenes.description: 韩立张口喷出青色精气，阵旗浮空对准晶墙表面，开始排列法阵。

visual.composition: Colorful flags arranging into complex pattern before wall

scenes.prompt: colorful flags arranging into complex formation pattern before crystal wall, mystical
scenes.narration: 韩立张口喷出青色精气，阵旗浮空对准晶墙，开始排列法阵。

scenes.description: 阵旗排列成古怪阵列，韩立打出法诀，光丝将阵旗联结成法阵。

visual.composition: Flags connected by glowing threads forming intricate pattern

scenes.prompt: close-up of flags connected by glowing threads forming mystical array pattern
scenes.narration: 阵旗排列成古怪阵列，韩立打出法诀，光丝将阵旗联结成法阵。

scenes.description: 韩立全身冒出刺目白光，众人被闪得闭眼，法阵已嵌入晶墙之中。

visual.composition: Bright flash as formation merges into crystal wall
visual.environment: Crystal hall with figures shielding eyes
visual.fx: White flash, formation sinking into wall

scenes.prompt: bright flash as formation merges into crystal wall, cultivators shielding eyes
scenes.narration: 韩立全身冒出刺目白光，众人被闪得闭眼，法阵已嵌入晶墙之中。

scenes.description: 南陇侯与白衫老者看到法阵嵌入晶墙，面露大喜之色对韩立信心大增。

visual.composition: Two elders smiling with formation visible in wall

scenes.prompt: two elders smiling approvingly at formation embedded in crystal wall
scenes.narration: 南陇侯与白衫老者看到法阵嵌入晶墙，面露大喜，对韩立信心大增。

scenes.description: 韩立双手按在晶墙表面，十指放出淡青色光华，法阵中心爆发五色霞光。

visual.composition: Hands on wall with colorful light radiating from formation center

scenes.prompt: close-up of hands on crystal wall with colorful light radiating from formation
scenes.narration: 韩立双手按在晶墙表面，十指放出淡青色光华，法阵中心五色霞光。

scenes.description: 韩立走到另一面晶墙，同样布下法阵并嵌入其中，众人啧啧称奇。

visual.composition: Han Li moving to next wall, others watching in amazement
visual.environment: Crystal hall with multiple glowing formations

scenes.prompt: cultivator setting up formation on another wall while others watch amazed
scenes.narration: 韩立走到另一面晶墙，同样布下法阵并嵌入其中，众人啧啧称奇。

scenes.description: 韩立用半个时辰在四面墙壁都布下法阵，众人耐心等待毫无急躁。

visual.composition: Four walls each with glowing formation embedded

scenes.prompt: wide pan of crystal hall showing four glowing formations on each wall
scenes.narration: 韩立用半个时辰在四面墙壁都布下法阵，众人耐心等待毫无急躁。

scenes.description: 韩立走到大厅中央，亮出碧绿色阵盘，向阵盘打出复杂法诀。

visual.composition: Han Li holding glowing green control disk in center

scenes.prompt: cultivator holding glowing green control disk in center of crystal hall
scenes.narration: 韩立走到大厅中央，亮出碧绿色阵盘，向阵盘打出复杂法诀。

scenes.description: 阵盘与四面晶墙中霞光同时闪烁，节奏从杂乱到统一，犹如一体。

visual.composition: All formations pulsing in perfect sync with control disk

scenes.prompt: wide shot of crystal hall with all formations pulsing in perfect synchronization
scenes.narration: 阵盘与四面晶墙中霞光同时闪烁，节奏从杂乱到统一，犹如一体。

scenes.description: 韩立低头低沉吐出一个“破”字，霞光高涨发出刺耳嗡鸣声。

visual.composition: Han Li's face with intense light behind, mouth forming word

scenes.prompt: close-up of cultivator speaking command word as light intensifies behind
scenes.narration: 韩立低头低沉吐出一个破字，霞光高涨发出刺耳嗡鸣，如万鸟齐鸣。

scenes.description: 轰隆巨响中霞光溃散，晶墙消失露出普通青石墙壁，石门显现。

visual.composition: Crystal walls dissolving to reveal stone walls with massive door

scenes.prompt: crystal walls dissolving to reveal stone walls with massive door, dramatic reveal
scenes.narration: 轰隆巨响中霞光溃散，晶墙消失露出普通青石墙壁，石门显现。

scenes.description: 南陇侯大喜称赞韩立阵法造诣，承诺让韩立优先挑选一件宝物。

visual.composition: Leader praising Han Li with others applauding

scenes.prompt: leader praising cultivator with others applauding in stone hall
scenes.narration: 南陇侯大喜称赞韩立阵法造诣，承诺让韩立优先挑选一件宝物。

scenes.description: 南陇侯长袖轻拂石门，大门朝内敞开，众人跟随进入门内。

visual.composition: Massive door opening inward revealing interior

scenes.prompt: massive stone door opening inward as cultivators enter, light spilling out
scenes.narration: 南陇侯长袖轻拂石门，大门朝内敞开，众人跟随进入门内。

scenes.description: 门后是更大的大厅，中央矗立一座白玉雕刻的精美阁楼，门上写着“玉矶阁”。

visual.composition: Jade-white pavilion in center of vast hall

scenes.prompt: wide shot of jade-white pavilion in center of vast stone hall, ethereal lighting
scenes.narration: 门后是更大的大厅，中央矗立一座白玉阁楼，门上写着玉矶阁三字。

scenes.description: 玉矶阁前有张陈旧供桌，上面供奉着一副银白色卷轴，银光闪闪。

visual.composition: Old altar table with glowing silver scroll

scenes.prompt: old altar table with glowing silver scroll before jade pavilion, mysterious
scenes.narration: 玉矶阁前有张陈旧供桌，上面供奉着一副银白色卷轴，银光闪闪。

scenes.description: 白衫老者谨慎上前，喷出白霞卷起卷轴，画轴展开露出儒生背影图。

visual.composition: Elder using white mist to unroll scroll revealing scholar figure

scenes.prompt: elder using white mist to unroll scroll revealing scholar silhouette
scenes.narration: 白衫老者谨慎上前，喷出白霞卷起卷轴，画轴展开露出儒生背影图。

scenes.description: 冷面修士询问这是否是苍坤上人，王天古目光闪动意有所指。

visual.composition: Group discussing scroll with suspicious glances

scenes.prompt: group of cultivators discussing scroll with suspicious expressions
scenes.narration: 冷面修士询问这是否是苍坤上人，王天古目光闪动意有所指。

scenes.description: 白衫老者打出红色法诀试探画轴，银光大放后恢复原样，并无异常。

visual.composition: Red spells hitting scroll causing silver flash

scenes.prompt: close-up of red spells hitting silver scroll causing flash, testing artifact
scenes.narration: 白衫老者打出红色法诀试探画轴，银光大放后恢复原样，并无异常。

scenes.description: 南陇侯建议暂且收起卷轴，等找到其他宝物后再做归属，众人同意。

visual.composition: Leader addressing group with scroll being put away

scenes.prompt: group of cultivators agreeing to leader's suggestion about scroll
scenes.narration: 南陇侯建议暂且收起卷轴，等找到其他宝物后再做归属，众人同意。

scenes.description: 一行人绕过供桌来到阁楼前，南陇侯迫不及待推开阁门。

visual.composition: Group approaching jade pavilion door, leader pushing it open

scenes.prompt: group approaching jade pavilion as leader pushes door open, light spilling out
scenes.narration: 一行人绕过供桌来到阁楼前，南陇侯迫不及待推开阁门。

scenes.description: 耀眼的灵光迎面射来，阁楼一层内三个乌木架子上摆满了宝物。

visual.composition: Three shelves filled with glowing treasures in jade pavilion

scenes.prompt: wide shot of jade pavilion interior with three shelves full of glowing treasures
scenes.narration: 耀眼的灵光迎面射来，阁楼一层内三个乌木架子上摆满了宝物。

scenes.description: 第一排是十六件古宝法宝，第二排是稀有材料，第三排是丹药小瓶。

visual.composition: Three rows of treasures: weapons, materials, pills

scenes.prompt: pan across three shelves showing weapons, materials, and pills with various glows
scenes.narration: 第一排是十六件古宝法宝，第二排是稀有材料，第三排是丹药小瓶。

scenes.description: 众人按捺心中火热，缓缓走进阁楼，开始打量这些宝物。

visual.composition: Cultivators entering pavilion cautiously, eyes scanning treasures

scenes.prompt: cultivators entering jade pavilion cautiously, eyes scanning treasures
scenes.narration: 众人按捺心中火热，缓缓走进阁楼，开始打量这些宝物。

scenes.description: 南陇侯代表众人检验宝物，其他人看似和气地议论宝物的来历和用途。

visual.composition: Leader examining treasures while others discuss

scenes.prompt: group of cultivators examining treasures while leader inspects, calculating expressions
scenes.narration: 南陇侯代表众人检验宝物，其他人看似和气地议论宝物的来历用途。

scenes.description: 韩立走到窗口观察阴凝草，燕如嫣上前搭话，韩立冷淡回应并提醒她与王蝉的关系。

visual.composition: Han Li examining plant, Yan Ruyan approaching from behind
visual.character_pose: Han Li focused, Yan Ruyan hesitant

scenes.prompt: two cultivators conversing near window, one examining plant, one approaching
scenes.narration: 韩立走到窗口观察阴凝草，燕如嫣上前搭话，韩立冷淡回应提醒。

scenes.description: 南陇侯说明分配规则，众人开始分配宝物，韩立得到一件竹筒古宝。

visual.composition: Leader explaining distribution rules, cultivators selecting treasures

scenes.prompt: cultivators distributing treasures according to rules, focused expressions
scenes.narration: 南陇侯说明分配规则，众人开始分配宝物，韩立得到一件竹筒古宝。

scenes.description: 一层宝物分配完毕，众人搜索无果后，准备前往二层继续寻宝。

visual.composition: Group preparing to go upstairs, some looking at staircase

scenes.prompt: group of cultivators preparing to ascend staircase in jade pavilion
scenes.narration: 一层宝物分配完毕，众人搜索无果后，准备前往二层继续寻宝。

scenes.description: 片尾画面定格在众人走向楼梯的背影，二层入口隐约可见。

visual.composition: Back view of cultivators approaching staircase
visual.environment: Jade pavilion interior with upper floor visible

scenes.prompt: rear view of cultivators approaching staircase in jade pavilion, upper floor glowing
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，下集看众人进入二层，发现苍坤上人供奉的妖神金像。
